mappings.name: API endpoint to search songs from the database given a query

error.description: Whether or not the request was successfully processed or not.

message.description: Error message if the request was unsuccessful.

response.description: Contains the response data if the request was successful.

error.description: Whether or not the request was successfully processed or not.

message.description: Error message if the request was unsuccessful.

response.description: Contains the response data if the request was successful.

similarity_list.description: Contains all the similarity items representing songs.
